snippet: Current candidates would do well to look back at the birth — and failure — of mortgage-backed securities.
abstract: Op-Ed article by Prof Louis Hyman notes that Mitt Romney's father, George C Romney, oversaw both the birth and the failure of the mortgage-backed security industry while secretary for housing and urban development during the Nixon administration; argues Romney, the other Republican presidential candidates and Pres Obama should consider the lessons that George Romney's experiences provide when looking for solutions to the continuing financial crisis.
lead_paragraph: Current candidates would do well to look back at the birth — and failure — of mortgage-backed securities.

headline.seo: The House That George Romney Built
headline.main: The House That George Romney Built
headline.print_headline: The House That George Romney Built
